https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zzBQ5z2QhbliuLmqwotZfzPlYPC.jpg Ross has been kidnapped and held on a remote farmhouse. A drink & drug addict, his two captors put him through a brutal regime to get him clean. But when he gets clean, Ross finds out the shocking real reasons behind his incarceration. Desperate Measures
